div.bibl: Narod Polski, Vol. XXIV, No. 1, Jan. 7, 1920.

body.p: The state and federal started this year wholesale arrests of small cities. Evidently, the American bolsheviks were not aware of the drive against them because thousands of the the hands of justice. This drive reveals very interesting particulars.

The authorities the addresses of those arrested, that the herds of the bolshevist movement in America are Russian and Polish Jews. A reprinted photo, with an inscription at the top reading, "Types raids," the names of Northwest Side.

An American not well acquainted with the European situation and not knowing how to tell nationalities from the physiognomy, would think that they are Poles, because their names end in "ski" In reality they are typical Jews from Poland or Russia.
You cannot find any Jewish presented in the above illustration.

Evidently, the Jews take is for granted that the Americans are very because Mr. Maclay Hoyne, the state's attorney, has informed the American public through the Chicago Tribune that of the bolsheviks are Russians and Poles. Mr. Hoyne is an American of Jewish descent, who protected the Jews at the cost of the Poles. all known that the Poles are not inclined towards and most probably Mr. Hoyne knows all about it; yet, he is fact that the majority of the arrested bolsheviks are Jews from Russia or Poland. This is can be proved by the above illustration.
All Polish organizations should protect very against such abuse of Poles. Such a Mr. Hoyne, occupying a high public office, should not be allowed to the publicly.
